article: david wells is days away from submitting to george steinbrenner 's overtures to rejoin the yankees and rebuffing an oral agreement to sign with the arizona diamondbacks , according to a baseball official , needing only to pass a physical this week and agree on the final terms of a two-year contract to return to the yankees .
abstract: yanks deal for wells is nearer
